description: This source file defines a test case class 'BuildTests' that verifies the ability of BitBake to build the virtual/libc package within the build environment, using temporary directories and configuration files.

classes.name: BuildTests
classes.description: A test case class inheriting from OESDKTestCase, designed to verify BitBake's ability to build 'virtual/libc' within the build environment.

methods.name: test_libc(self)
methods.description: Creates a temporary build environment, initializes it, writes configuration, runs the build for 'virtual/libc', and waits for locks to be released.
